actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Mingo National Wildlife Refuge, Wayne and Stoddard Counties, Mo., as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Mingo National Wildlife Refuge, Wayne and Stoddard Counties, Missouri (including the Monopoly Lake area) as wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Mingo National Wildlife Refuge, Wayne and Stoddard Counties, Mo., as wilderness.
